document_data.name: Snilloc's Snowball Swarm
document_data.mainbody: '''''Snilloc's snowball swarm''''', also just '''''snowball swarm''''',{{Cite web/Spell index}} was a spell that generated an explosion of snowballs that covered a {{SIAdj|10|ft}} radius area.<ref>{{Cite web/Forgotten Realms campaign setting spell list}} An older version of this spell covered a {{SIAdj|30|ft}} radius but did less damage.
document_data.Effect:
When the caster finished the spell, those within the area felt an unnatural chill. This cold dissipated suddenly as a barrage of snowballs burst forth. 

The caster could choose the center of the explosion and was subject to being struck if within the area of effect.
document_data.Components: [[Verbal]], [[somatic]], and [[material component]]s were required to cast this spell, including a piece of ice or a small chip of white rock. The material component of the earlier version of the spell was either ice or a single [[pearl]].
document_data.History: This spell was created by the mage [[Snilloc]]. He placed this spell in the tome ''[[The Collected Wisdom of Snilloc]]''. Eventually the tome was stolen and this spell was copied and appeared throughout the Realms.<ref> This spell was also in the pamphlet ''[[Volo's Guide to All Things Magical (in Universe)|Volo's Guide to All Things Magical]]'' published at the start of [[1369 DR]].<ref> This spell quickly passed into the ranks of the [[Zhentarim]] and most of their mages had access to this spell.<ref> The [[Red Wizards of Thay]] quite often placed this spell on scrolls.<ref>
